message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I know you'll find it incredibly valuable. My initial offer is $20,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
I'm still not convinced that $17,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $14,000?
